description:
Moroha and Shizuno join the Strikers. Satsuki is frustrated by her lack of ability, but one weekend, she faces down a Metaphysical at the shopping mall.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dwell Within My Sword, Magic Flame
Waga Ken ni Yadoru Ma Honoo: The Swordbringer Comes Back.
我が剣に宿れ魔焔 The Swordbringer comes back.
